name: Fear the Sun
target: up to one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: Each target that fails its saving throw gains light blindness, as per the universal monster rule. When exposed to bright light, affected targets are blinded for 1 full round and are dazzled in successive rounds. If you cast this spell in the presence of bright light, any target that fails its save is blinded immediately, and dazzled starting at the beginning of its first turn.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（一根卓尔睫毛）
target_zh: 每施法者等级一个生物，任意两者之间不得超过30尺
text_zh: 每个豁免失败的目标获得如同通用怪物规则中的强光失明 (Light Blindness）能力，当他们暴露在明亮光线下，受影响的生物会目盲一整轮并且在剩余的轮数中处于目眩状态，如果你在明亮光线下施展这个法术，任何在豁免中失败的目标会立即目盲，并且在它们的第一个回合开始时目眩。
